channel.title: Hugo on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Why I Made a Blog, Not a Portfolio
item.description:
Portfolios are pretty common projects for junior and mid-level frontend engineers. I had one before I got my first engineering job, which you can see in all of its glory, here. Let’s be co-critical for a moment. Here are the easy things that stick out to the “me” of today…

What was I doing wrong?

1. I have 2 projects listed as “coming soon”.

Spoiler alert - Those projects weren’t ever completed 😂. My first instinct is to say that I got hired, but if I’m being honest with myself I actually abandoned them as concepts before that.
